validation_results.description: Database Schema Validation - Schema syntax, completeness, MySQL compliance
validation_results.stdout:
🗄️  Robot Console Database Schema Validation
============================================================

--- Environment Configuration ---
🔍 Validating .env configuration...
✅ DATABASE_TYPE: mysql
✅ MYSQL_HOST: localhost
✅ MYSQL_USER: robot_console
✅ MYSQL_PASSWORD: 1122root
✅ MYSQL_DATABASE: robot_console
✅ All environment variables properly configured

--- MySQL Schema Syntax ---

🔍 Validating MySQL schema syntax...
✅ Found AUTO_INCREMENT syntax for primary keys
⚠️  Missing MySQL parameter placeholders (%s)
⚠️  Missing MySQL timestamp defaults
✅ Found VARCHAR with length specifications
✅ Found Foreign key constraints
✅ No SQLite leftovers found

--- Query Placeholders ---

🔍 Validating query placeholders...
✅ All queries use dynamic placeholders

--- Schema Completeness ---

🔍 Validating schema completeness...
✅ Found table 'users'
✅ Found table 'bookings'
✅ Found table 'sessions'
✅ Found table 'messages'
✅ Found table 'announcements'
✅ All required tables and columns found

--- App Feature Mapping ---

🔍 Validating app feature mapping...
📋 Required features and their database support:
✅ User authentication
    - users table with email/password fields
✅ Role-based access
    - users.role field with admin/user values
✅ Robot booking
    - bookings table with robot_type, date, time fields
✅ Session management
    - sessions table for JWT tokens
✅ Contact messaging
    - messages table for contact form
✅ Admin announcements
    - announcements table with priority and active status
✅ Demo user support
    - Users can be created with demo credentials

--- File Consistency ---

🔍 Validating file consistency...
✅ No SQLite database files found
✅ DATABASE_TYPE consistent across .env files

============================================================
📊 Validation Results: 6/6 tests passed
🎉 All validations passed! Database schema is ready for MySQL.

📝 Summary:
  ✅ Only MySQL is being used (no SQLite leftovers)
  ✅ All migrations, schema, and queries match MySQL conventions
  ✅ .env files properly configured for DB credentials
  ✅ Schema matches app features: users, bookings, messages, sessions, announcements
  ✅ Demo user setup can work with database authentication
  ✅ No mismatched schema or unused tables found
